Uses of Class
it.unipr.accounts.Person

Packages that use Person
Package
Description
it.unipr.accounts
This package contains all the classes necessary to manage the main actors of this program.
it.unipr.controllers.employee
This package contains all the classes needed for the management of the employee interface Through the four controllers, EmploueeController, OrderController, PersonController, ProductController, all the functionalities of the employee and administrator are covered.
it.unipr.controllers.user
This package contains all the classes needed for the management of the user interface.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Admin
    The Admin class, as a child class of Employee, provides all the methods to administrate the entire system in addition to having all the Employee's methods
    class 
    Employee
    The Employee, as a child class of Person, provides all the necessary methods to complete the tasks of an employee.
    class 
    User
    The User class, as a child class of Person, provides all the necessary methods and attributes for all the user tasks
